00009 #include "TTMaxObject.h"
00010 
00011 
00012 void ttMaxObjectInit(t_class *c)
00013 {
00014         common_symbols_init();
00015         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(TTMaxObject, obex));
00016 
00017         class_addmethod(c, (method)ttMaxObjectDSP,      "dsp",          A_CANT, 0L);            
00018 
00019         class_addattr(c, attr_offset_new("bypass", _sym_long, 0,
00020                 (method)0L,(method)ttMaxObjectSetBypass, calcoffset(TTMaxObject, attrBypass)));
00021 }
00022 
00023 
00024 void ttMaxObjectCreate(TTMaxObject *x, t_symbol *msg, short argc, t_atom *argv, t_perfroutine performRoutine)
00025 {
00026         TTValue         sr(sys_getsr());
00027         long            attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);
00028         short           i;
00029 
00030         x->objectCount = 0;
00031         x->attrBypass = 0;
00032         x->maxNumChannels = 2;          // An initial argument to this object will set the maximum number of channels
00033         if(attrstart && argv)
00034                 x->maxNumChannels = atom_getlong(argv);
00035         x->performRoutine = performRoutine;
00036 
00037         attr_args_process(x,argc,argv);                         // handle attribute args        
00038                         
00039         object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x,NULL));       // dumpout      
00040         dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, x->maxNumChannels);                                                          // inlets
00041         for(i=0; i < x->maxNumChannels; i++)
00042                 outlet_new((t_pxobject *)x, "signal");                                                                  // outlets
00043         
00044         x->obj.z_misc = Z_NO_INPLACE;
00045 
00046         TTAudioObject::setGlobalParameterValue(TT("sr"), sr);
00047 
00048         x->audioIn = new TTAudioSignal(x->maxNumChannels);
00049         x->audioOut = new TTAudioSignal(x->maxNumChannels);
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 void ttMaxObjectFree(TTMaxObject *x)
00054 {
00055         short i;
00056 
00057         dsp_free((t_pxobject *)x);
00058         for(i=0; i < x->objectCount; i++)
00059                 delete x->objectList[i];
00060 
00061         delete x->audioIn;
00062         delete x->audioOut;
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 void ttMaxObjectAdd(TTMaxObject *x, TTAudioObject *ttobj)
00067 {
00068         x->objectList[x->objectCount] = ttobj;
00069         x->objectCount++;
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 // DSP Method
00074 void ttMaxObjectDSP(TTMaxObject *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00075 {
00076         short   i, j, k=0;
00077         void    **audioVectors = NULL;
00078         
00079         audioVectors = (void**)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(void*) * ((x->maxNumChannels * 2) + 1));
00080         audioVectors[k] = x;
00081         k++;
00082         
00083         x->audioIn->numChannels = 0;
00084         x->audioOut->numChannels = 0;   
00085         for(i=0; i < x->maxNumChannels; i++){
00086                 j = x->maxNumChannels + i;
00087                 if(count[i] && count[j]){
00088                         audioVectors[k] = sp[i]->s_vec;
00089                         x->audioIn->numChannels++;
00090                         x->audioIn->vs = sp[i]->s_n;
00091                         k++;
00092                         audioVectors[k] = sp[j]->s_vec;
00093                         x->audioOut->numChannels++;
00094                         x->audioIn->vs = sp[j]->s_n;
00095                         k++;
00096                 }
00097         }
00098         
00099         for(i=0; i < x->objectCount; i++)
00100                 x->objectList[i]->setParameterValue(TT("sr"), sp[0]->s_sr);
00101         dsp_addv(x->performRoutine, k, audioVectors);
00102         sysmem_freeptr(audioVectors);
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 t_max_err ttMaxObjectSetBypass(TTMaxObject *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00107 {
00108         if(argc){
00109                 short i;
00110         
00111                 x->attrBypass = atom_getlong(argv);
00112                 for(i=0; i < x->objectCount; i++)
00113                         x->objectList[i]->setParameterValue(TT("bypass"), x->attrBypass);
00114         }
00115         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00116 }
